verses.verse: Now the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> "Do not <S%H3372>fear<s%> or be <S%H2865>dismayed.<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> with you and <S%H6965>arise,<s%> <S%H5927>go<s%> up to <S%H5857>Ai;<s%> <S%H7200>see,<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> his <S%H5892>city,<s%> and his <S%H776>land.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H5857>Ai<s%> and its <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as you <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> and its <S%H4428>king;<s%> you shall <S%H962>take<s%> <S%H7534>only<s%> its <S%H7998>spoil<s%> and its <S%H929>cattle<s%> as <S%H962>plunder<s%> for yourselves. <S%H7760>Set<s%> an <S%H693>ambush<s%> for the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H4480>behind<s%> <S%H310><s%> it."

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> to <S%H5927>go<s%> up to <S%H5857>Ai;<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H977>chose<s%> 30000 <S%H376>men,<s%> <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H1368>warriors,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> them out at <S%H3915>night.<s%>

And he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7200>"See,<s%> you are going to <S%H693>ambush<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> from <S%H310>behind<s%> it. Do not <S%H7368>go<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from the <S%H5892>city,<s%> but <S%H3605>all<s%> of you be <S%H3559>ready.<s%>

"Then I and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are with me will <S%H7126>approach<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%> And it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about <S%H3588>when<s%> they <S%H3318>come<s%> out to <S%H7122>meet<s%> us as at the <S%H7223>first,<s%> that we will <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

"And they will <S%H3318>come<s%> out <S%H310>after<s%> us <S%H5704>until<s%> we have <S%H5423>drawn<s%> them <S%H5423>away<s%> from the <S%H5892>city,<s%> for they will <S%H559>say,<s%> '[They] are <S%H5127>fleeing<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> us as at the <S%H7223>first.<s%>' So we will <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

"And you shall <S%H6965>rise<s%> from [your] <S%H693>ambush<s%> and <S%H3423>take<s%> <S%H3423>possession<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> it into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

"Then it will be when you have <S%H8610>seized<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> that you shall <S%H3341>set<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> on <S%H784>fire.<s%> You shall <S%H6213>do<s%> [it] according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> <S%H7200>See,<s%> I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you."

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> them <S%H7971>away,<s%> and they <S%H1980>went<s%> to the place of <S%H3993>ambush<s%> and <S%H3427>remained<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> and <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> on the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H3220>side<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai;<s%> but <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3885>spent<s%> that <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Now <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7925>rose<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> and <S%H6485>mustered<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and he <S%H5927>went<s%> up with the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H5857>Ai.<s%>

Then <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> [were] with him <S%H5927>went<s%> up and <S%H5066>drew<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> and <S%H935>arrived<s%> in <S%H5048>front<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6828>side<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai.<s%> Now [there was] a <S%H1516>valley<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> him and <S%H5857>Ai.<s%>

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> about 5000 <S%H376>men<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> them in <S%H693>ambush<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> and <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> on the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H3220>side<s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

So they <S%H7760>stationed<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4264>army<s%> that was on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6828>side<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and its <S%H6119>rear<s%> <S%H6119>guard<s%> on the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H3220>side<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H1980>spent<s%> that <S%H3915>night<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6010>valley.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> [it,] that the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H4116>hurried<s%> and <S%H7925>rose<s%> up <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H3318>went<s%> out to <S%H7122>meet<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H4421>battle,<s%> he and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> at the <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>place<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6160>desert<s%> <S%H6160>plain.<s%> But he did not <S%H3045>know<s%> that [there was] an <S%H693>ambush<s%> against him <S%H4480>behind<s%> <S%H310><s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5060>pretended<s%> to be <S%H5060>beaten<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them, and <S%H5127>fled<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were in the <S%H5892>city<s%> were <S%H2199>called<s%> <S%H2199>together<s%> to <S%H7291>pursue<s%> them, and they <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and were <S%H5423>drawn<s%> <S%H5423>away<s%> from the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

So not a <S%H376>man<s%> was <S%H7604>left<s%> in <S%H5857>Ai<s%> or <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> had not <S%H3318>gone<s%> out <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and they <S%H5800>left<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H6605>unguarded<s%> and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H5186>"Stretch<s%> out the <S%H3591>javelin<s%> that is in your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> for I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>" So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out the <S%H3591>javelin<s%> that was in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And the [men in] <S%H693>ambush<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> <S%H4120>quickly<s%> from their <S%H4725>place,<s%> and when he had <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> they <S%H7323>ran<s%> and <S%H935>entered<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> and <S%H3920>captured<s%> it; and they <S%H4116>quickly<s%> <S%H3341>set<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> on <S%H784>fire.<s%>

When the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> <S%H310>back<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H6227>smoke<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H5927>ascended<s%> to the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and they <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3027>place<s%> to <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2008>way<s%> or that, for the <S%H5971>people<s%> who had been <S%H5127>fleeing<s%> to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H7291>pursuers.<s%>

When <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H376>[men<s%> in] <S%H693>ambush<s%> had <S%H3920>captured<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> and that the <S%H6227>smoke<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H5927>ascended,<s%> they <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> and <S%H5221>slew<s%> the men of <S%H5857>Ai.<s%>

And the <S%H428>others<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out from the <S%H5892>city<s%> to <S%H7122>encounter<s%> them, so that they were [trapped] in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H428>some<s%> on <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2088>side<s%> and <S%H428>some<s%> on that <S%H2088>side;<s%> and they <S%H5221>slew<s%> them <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H1115>no<s%> one was <S%H7604>left<s%> of those <S%H8300>who<s%> <S%H8300>survived<s%> or <S%H6412>escaped.<s%>
But they <S%H8610>took<s%> <S%H2416>alive<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%> and <S%H7126>brought<s%> him to <S%H3091>Joshua.<s%>

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H2026>killing<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> they <S%H7291>pursued<s%> them, and <S%H3605>all<s%> of them were <S%H5307>fallen<s%> by the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> they were <S%H8552>destroyed,<s%> then <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H5857>Ai<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>
And <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H5307>fell<s%> that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H4480>both<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> and <S%H802>women,<s%> were 12000 â€“ <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>people<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai.<s%>

For <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> did not <S%H7725>withdraw<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out the <S%H3591>javelin<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he had <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai.<s%>

<S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H962>took<s%> <S%H7534>only<s%> the <S%H929>cattle<s%> and the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of that <S%H5892>city<s%> as <S%H962>plunder<s%> for themselves, according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua.<s%>

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H8313>burned<s%> <S%H5857>Ai<s%> and <S%H7760>made<s%> it a <S%H8510>heap<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And he <S%H8518>hanged<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%> on a <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening;<s%> and at <S%H8121>sunset<s%> <S%H935><s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6680>gave<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> and they <S%H3381>took<s%> his <S%H5038>body<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H6086>tree,<s%> and <S%H7993>threw<s%> it at the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and <S%H6965>raised<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> it a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1530>heap<s%> of <S%H68>stones<s%> [that stands] to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
<S%H227>Then<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> in <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H9403>Ebal,<s%>

<S%H9201>just<s%> as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> as it is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H8003>uncut<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> man had <S%H5130>wielded<s%> an <S%H1270>iron<s%> [tool;] and they <S%H5927>offered<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings<s%> on it to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings.<s%>

And he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> on the <S%H68>stones<s%> a <S%H4932>copy<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H3789>written,<s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with their <S%H2205>elders<s%> and <S%H7860>officers<s%> and their <S%H8199>judges<s%> were <S%H5975>standing<s%> on <S%H4480>both<s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H4480>sides<s%> <S%H2088><s%> of the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> the <S%H3881>Levitical<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> who <S%H5375>carried<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> as well as the <S%H249>native.<s%> <S%H2677>Half<s%> of them [stood] in <S%H4136>front<s%> of <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H1630>Gerizim<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> of them in <S%H4136>front<s%> of <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H9403>Ebal,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>given<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> at <S%H7223>first<s%> to <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Then <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> he <S%H7121>read<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H8451>law,<s%> the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> and the <S%H7045>curse,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law.<s%>

There was not a <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> did not <S%H7121>read<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with the <S%H802>women<s%> and the <S%H2945>little<s%> <S%H2945>ones<s%> and the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> who were <S%H1980>living<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> them.
